window.comment: MD - Voltage Input voltage. Equal to battery voltage if no charging occurrs.
MD - Calibrate R46 Shunt for measuring input current from solar cell
MD - DCF77 accept level Set accepted error tolerance in signal
MD - Flicker workaround Enabling the workaround prevents the RC oscillator from stopping. This prevents sporadic loss of interrupts which can be seen as flicker on the LED display.
MD - Free RAM RAMFREE is the only string fitting on the display
D - Show voltage of the input
D - Show current of the charger
D - Show battery mAh state Only estimated... For security reason, changeing the value is only possible over the RS232/RFM12 with the c and C key when in this view.
D - Show performance 1. Value: Rc oscillator on time 2. Value: CPU runnig time
